page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT AT SCHOOL.
page.content: AT SCHOOL I PLAY SKIPPING. TO PLAY SKIPPING YOU NEED ONE OR TWO PEOPLE. YOU GET THE ROPE AND TAKE IT OVER YOUR HEAD AND JUMP IT, IF IT'S JUST ONE PERSON, BUT IF IT'S TWO PEOPLE ONE PERSON HOLDS THE ROPE AND TAKES IT OVER THEIR HEAD AND AT THE SAME TIME OVER THE OTHER PERSONS HEAD AND THEY BOTH TRY TO JUMP IT. IF YOU DO BACKWARD SKIPPING YOU HAVE IT IN FRONT OF YOU AND TAKE IT OVER YOUR HEAD AND JUMP IT. IF IT IS TWO PEOPLE THE PERSON WHO HOLDS THE ROPE HAS IT IN FRONT OF THEM AND TAKES IT OVER HIS HEAD AND JUMPS IT AND THE OTHER PERSON JUMPS IT TOO AND THE OTHER PERSON TAKES IT OVER THEIR HEAD AND SO ON. BY JANE WALTON
